original_text: I came down from the mountain. I put the stones into the box that I had made, as the Lord had told me to do. The stones are still there now.
korean_text: 내가 돌이켜 산에서 내려와서 여호와께서 내게 명령하신 대로 그 판을 내가 만든 궤에 넣었더니 지금까지 있느니라

sentences.original_text: I came down from the mountain
I put the stones into the box
as the Lord had told me to do
The stones are still there now
